Mi ciudad natal, única e irrepetible.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(FlickrAPI)
library(pixture)
library(dplyr)
here::i_am("lgrs/Trieste.qmd")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
file_name <- here::here("data","google-photos.rds")
ggl_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name)
img_folder <- "img"
photos <- ggl_photos %>% filter(grepl("Maracaibo",mediaItems.description),
album %in% "Lugareños")
slc <- sample(seq(along=photos),size=1)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
htmlcode <- "<center>\n<img src='%s/%s'>\n<br/>\n
<strong>%s</strong>  por <a href='%s' target='googlephotos'>JR Ferrer-Paris @ Google Photos</a><br/>
</center>"

show_photo <- photos %>% 
    slice(slc) %>%
    transmute(code = sprintf(htmlcode, img_folder, mediaItems.filename, mediaItems.description, mediaItems.productUrl)) %>% pull()
cat(show_photo)
```

## Imágenes de Maracaibo

```{r}
#| echo: false

paths <- sprintf("%s/%s",img_folder, pull(photos[-slc,],mediaItems.filename))
captions <- photos %>%
  slice(-slc) %>% 
  transmute(caption=sprintf("<strong>%s</strong>  por <a href='%s' target='googlephotos'>JR Ferrer-Paris @ Google Photos</a>",mediaItems.description,mediaItems.productUrl)) %>% 
  pull

pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)

```
```{r}
#| echo: false
paths <- sprintf("http://i.imgur.com/%s.jpg?1",
c("BO7Hzhx", "jFlMDBE"))
```
